definition: "dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Wang Youqin was a student at the Beijing Normal University High School when Ms.
sentences.chinese: 卞女士被打死時，王友琴是在北京師大附中的學生。

sentences.english: Bian Zhuangzi felt the waiter had a good point, so he stood to the side and watched the fight unfold.
sentences.chinese: 卞莊子覺得很有道理，就在一旁觀察局勢的發展。

sentences.english: Someone had discovered that the next day, Friday, was Miss Benson's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 原來有人發現，第二天星期五，是卞老師的生日。

sentences.english: Tan pointed out that the government had established priorities.
sentences.chinese: 譚富卞指出政府已定下了輕重緩急。

definition: surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Di/variant of 狄[Di2], generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
